decision_conditions: The wording of condition no. 2 of planning permission 216077REM dated 30/08/2022 shall now be taken to be:

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Cover letter prepared by Berkeley Homes dated 31 October 2023, Block E, Phase 2, The Green Quarter Design Statement Rev 00 dated October 2021, Phase 2 - Overall Summary and Illustrative Landscape
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 216077REM dated 30/08/2022 for: Application for the approval of Reserved Matters pursuant to outline planning permission reference 171562VAR dated 16/10/2017, condition 2 pertaining to the second phase of development (Phase 2): details relating to Layout, Appearance, Scale and Landscaping.  Amendment seeks to include provision of secondary staircase with direct external access at ground floor; changes to layouts of approved residential units; revision of ground floor residential refuse holding area and increase the quantum of commercial area; and amendments to Building E to include a roof garden to provide private amenity space
